Verses: 1 ivaigalukkup Pinbu Karththar Vere Ezhubadhuperai Niyamiththu, Thaam Pogum Sagala Pattanangalukkum Idangalukkum Avargalaith Thamakku Munne Irandirandu Peraaga Anuppinaar.
2 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Aruppu Migudhi, Velaiyaatkalo Konjam; Aagaiyaal Aruppukku Ejamaan (aruvadaiyin Ejamaan) Thamadhu Aruppukku Velaiyaatkalai Anuppumbadi Avarai Vendikkollungal.
3 purappattuppongal; Aattukkuttigalai Onaaigalukkulle Anuppugiradhupola, Idho, Naan Ungalai Anuppugiren
4 panappaiyaiyum Saamaan Paiyaiyum Paadharatchaigalaiyum Kondupogavendaam; Vazhiyile Oruvaraiyum Vinavavum Vendaam.
5 oru Veettil Piravesikkirapodhu: Indha Veettukkuch Samaadhaanam Undaavadhaagavendru Mudhalaavadhu Sollungal.
6 samaadhaana Paaththiran Ange Irundhaal, Neengal Koorina Samaadhaanam Avanidaththil Thangum, Illaadhirundhaal Adhu Ungalitaththirkuth Thirumbivarum.
7 andha Veettiledhaane Neengal Thangiyirundhu, Avargal Kodukkiravaigalaip Pusiththuk Kudiyungal; Velaiyaal Than Koolikkup Paaththiranaayirukkiraan. Veettukku Veedu Pogaadhirungal.
8 oru Pattanaththil Neengal Piravesikkirapozhudhu, Janangal Ungalai Etrukkondaal Avargal Ungalmun Vaikkiravaigalai Neengal Pusiththu,
9 avvidaththilulla Piniyaaligalaich Sosdhamaakki: Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalukkuch Sameebamaai Vandhirukkiradhu Endru Avargalukkuch Sollungal.
10 yaadhoru Pattanaththil Neengal Piravesikkirapozhudhu, Janangal Ungalai Etrukkollaavittaal Adhin Veedhigalile Neengal Poi:

11 engalil Ottina Ungal Pattanaththin Thoosiyaiyum Ungalukku Virodhamaaith Thudaiththuppodugirom; Aayinum Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalukkuch Sameebamaai Vandhirukkiradhenbadhai Arindhukolveergalaaga Endru Sollungal.
12 andhap Pattanaththirku Neriduvadhaippaarkkilum Andha Naalile Sodhom Naattirku Neriduvadhu Laguvaayirukkum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.

13 koraaseen Pattaname, Unakku, Aiyo, Pedhsaayidhaa Pattaname, Unakku Aiyo, Ungalil Seyyappatta Balaththa Seygaigal Theeruvilum Seedhonilum Seyyappattirundhadhaanaal, Appozhudhe Rattuduththi, Saambalil Utkaarndhu, Mananthirumbiyiruppaargal.
14 niyaayaththeerppunaalil Ungalukku Neriduvadhaippaarkkilum, Theeruvukkum Seedhonukkum Neriduvadhu Laguvaayirukkum.
15 vaanabariyandham Uyarththappatta Kapparnagoome, Nee Paadhaalapariyandham Thaazhththappaduvaai Endru Solli,

16 seesharai Nokki: Ungalukkuch Sevikodukkiravan Enakkuch Sevikodukkiraan, Ungalai Asattaipannugiravan Ennai Asattaipannugiraan, Ennai Asattaipannugiravan Ennai Anuppinavarai Asattaipannugiraan Endraar.
17 pinbu Andha Ezhubadhuperum Sandhoshaththode Thirumbivandhu: Aandavare, Ummudaiya Naamaththinaale Pisaasugalum Engalukkuk Keezhppadigiradhu Endraargal.
18 avargalai Avar Nokki: Saaththaan Minnalaippola Vaanaththilirundhu Vizhugiradhaik Kanden.
19 idho, Sarppangalaiyum Thelgalaiyum Midhikkavum, Saththuruvinudaiya Sagala Vallamaiyaiyum Merkollavum Ungalukku Adhigaarang Kodukkiren; Ondrum Ungalaich Sedhappaduththamaattaadhu.
20 aagilum, Aavigal Ungalukkuk Keezhppadigiradharkaaga Neengal Sandhoshappadaamal, Ungal Naamangal Paralogaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradharkaagach Sandhoshappadungal Endraar.

21 andha Velaiyil Yesu Aaviyile Kalikoorndhu: Pidhaave! Vaanaththukkum Boomikkum Aandavare! Ivaigalai Neer Gnaanigalukkum Kalvimaangalukkum Maraiththu, Paalagarukku Velippaduththinapadiyaal Ummai Sthoththirikkiren; Aam, Pidhaave! Ippadich Seyvadhu Ummudaiya Thiruvulaththukkup Piriyamaayirundhadhu.

22 sagalamum En Pidhaavinaal Enakku Oppukkodukkappattirukkiradhu; Pidhaa Thavira Veroruvanum Kumaaran Innaarendru Ariyaan, Kumaaranum, Kumaaran Avarai Evanukku Velippaduththach Siththamaayirukkiraaro Avanundhavira, Veroruvanum Pidhaa Innaarendru Ariyaan Endraar.
23 pinbu, Thamadhu Seesharidaththil Thirumbi, Thaniththu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Kaangiravaigalaik Kaanung Kangal Baakkiyamullavaigal.
24 anega Theerkkadharisigalum Raajaakkalum Neengal Kaangiravaigalaik Kaanavum, Neengal Ketkiravaigalaik Ketkavum Virumbiyum, Kaanaamalum Kelaamalum Ponaargal Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
25 appozhudhu Niyaayasaasdhiri Oruvan Ezhundhirundhu, Avaraich Sodhikkumpadi: Podhagare, Niththiya Jeevanaich Sudhandhariththukkollumpadikku Naan Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaan.
26 adharku Avar: Niyaayappiramaanaththil Enna Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu? Nee Vaasiththirukkiradhu Enna Endraar.

27 avan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Un Muzhuaaththumaavodum, Un Muzhupbalaththodum Un Muzhuchsindhaiyodum Anbukoorndhu, Unnidaththil Anbukooruvadhupolap Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu Endraan.
28 avar Avanai Nerakki: Nidhaanamaai Uththaravu Sonnaai; Appadiye Sey, Appozhudhu Pizhaippaai Endraar.
29 avan Thannai Neethimaan Endru Kaanbikka Manadhaai Yesuvai Nokki: Enakkup Piran Yaar Endru Kettaan.

30 yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Oru Manushan Erusalemilirundhu Erigovukkup Pogaiyil Kallar Kaiyil Agappattaan; Avargal Avan Vasthirangalai Urindhukondu Avanaik Kaayappaduththi, Kutruyiraaga Vittup Ponaargal.
31 appozhudhu Tharseyalaai Oru Aasaariyan Andha Vazhiye Vandhu, Avanaikkandu, Pakkamaai Vilakipponaan.
32 andhappadiye Oru Leviyanum Andha Idaththukku Vandhu, Avanaik Kandu, Pakkamaai Vilakipponaan.
33 pinbu Samaariyan Oruvan Pirayaanamaai Varugaiyil, Avanaik Kandu, Manadhurugi,
34 kitta Vandhu, Avanudaiya Kaayangalil Enneyum Thiraatcharasamum Vaarththu, Kaayangalaik Katti, Avanaith Than Suyavaaganaththinmel Etri, Saththiraththukkuk Kondupoi, Avanaip Paraamariththaan.

35 marunaalile Thaan Purappadumpodhu Irandu Panaththai Eduththu, Saththiraththaan Kaiyil Koduththu: Nee Ivanai Visaariththukkol, Adhigamaai Edhaagilum Ivanukkaakach Selavazhiththaal, Naan Thirumbivarumpodhu Adhai Unakkuth Tharuven Endraan.
36 ippadiyirukka, Kallarkaiyil Agappattavanukku Indha Moondruperil Evan Piranaayirundhaan? Unakku Eppadiththondrugiradhu Endraar.
37 adharku Avan: Avanukku Irakkanjeydhavane Endraan. Appozhudhu Yesu Avanai Nokki: Neeyum Poi Andhappadiye Sey Endraar.
38 pinbu, Avargal Pirayaanamaaip Pogaiyil, Avar Oru Giraamaththil Piravesiththaar. Ange Maarththaal Ennumperkonda Oru Sthiree Avaraith Thanveettile Etrukkondaal.
39 avalukku Mariyaal Ennappatta Oru Sagodhari Irundhaal; Aval Yesuvin Paadhaththaruge Utkaarndhu, Avarudaiya Vasanaththaik Kettukkondirundhaal.

40 maarththaalo Parpala Velaigalaich Seyvadhil Migavum Varuththamadaindhu, Avaridaththil Vandhu: Aandavare, Naan Thaniye Velaiseyyumpadi En Sagodhari Ennai Vittu Vandhirukkiradhaik Kuriththu Umakkuk Kavaiyillaiyaa (akkaraiyillaiyaa)? Enakku Udhaviseyyumpadi Avalukkuch Sollum Endraal.
41 yesu Avalukkup Piradhiyuththramaaga: Maarththaale, Maarththaale, Nee Anega Kaariyangalaik Kuriththuk Kavalaippattuk Kalangugiraai.
42 thevaiyaanadhu Ondre, Mariyaal Thannai Vittedupadaadha Nalla Pangaith Therindhukondaal Endraar.
